newsitem.title: USA: Philip Morris $1 bln global debt issue seen.
newsitem.headline: Philip Morris $1 bln global debt issue seen.

text.p: Philip Morris Cos Inc is expected to tap the corporate bond market with a $1.0 billion global debt offering, dealers said Tuesday.
The deal, expected to include an eight-year maturity, will be underwritten by Merrill Lynch & Co, dealers said.
The offering is expected to be launched Wednesday, they said.
